articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Big Chungus may join MultiVersus roster
articles.description: Warner Bros. has filed a trademark for Big Chungus, the meme image of a large Bugs Bunny. This may mean that he’s headed to the free-to-play fighting game MultiVersus.
articles.content:
One of 2016s best memes may be coming back to kick your ass in one of 2022s best games. 
Warner Bros. has filed a trademark with the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) for using Big… [+714 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Sam Barlow’s Immortality is free with a Netflix subscription
articles.description: Immortality, from Her Story creator Sam Barlow and developer Half Mermaid, is free with your Netflix subscription on Aug. 30. It’s also available on Xbox Series X via Game Pass and on Windows PC via Steam and GOG.
articles.content: Her Story creator Sam Barlows next game with developer Half Mermaid is out Tuesday, and its free for anyone with a Netflix subscription. Immortality, which is also coming to Windows PC via Steam and … [+1233 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Pokémon Go Season of Light launch date, raids, and Cosmog announced
articles.description: Pokémon Go’s new season launches Sept. 1 and will bring Legendary Pokémon Cosmog to Niantic’s mobile game. The season will also add new raid Pokémon, Shiny Inkay, and a lot more.
articles.content: Pokémon Gos next season of content, dubbed the Season of Light, launches Thursday, Sept. 1, and will welcome the Legendary Pokémon Cosmog to Niantics mobile game. With Cosmogs arrival comes a themed … [+3888 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Kickstarter’s new director on the future of the crowdfunding platform
articles.description: Kickstarter’s new director of games, Jon Ritter-Roderick, sees himself as an ambassador and an advisor. In his first interview, we asked him about the future of the platform — and its push into blockchain technology.
articles.content: Kickstarter announced Tuesday that it would elevate board game designer and publisher Jon Ritter-Roderick to be its new director of games. Ritter-Roderick has been with the company since 2020, servin… [+5043 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Xbox Games With Gold free games for September 2022: Portal 2
articles.description: Xbox Live Gold and Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers get 4 games from Games with Gold in June 2022: Portal 2, Thrillville, Gods Will Fall, and Double Kick Heroes. Those games are all playable on Xbox One and Xbox Series X.
articles.content: Xbox Live sunsets almost a decade of Xbox 360 giveaways in September with Portal 2. Starting October, Games With Gold will only be offering Xbox Live Gold and Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers acce… [+1727 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Kinfire Chronicles board game that shares a writer with The Witcher 3
articles.description: Kinfire Chronicles: Night’s Fall was written by some of the writers behind The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. The stacked team includes the art director from Cyberpunk 2077 and Kevin Wilson, the tabletop designer behind Arkham Horror and Descent: Legends of the Dark.

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Rock Band finally adds more Muse — 14 years later
articles.description: After 14 years of the band’s absence from the game, three Muse songs are coming to Rock Band in a new DLC. The DLC will be available on Sept. 1. The songs are “Knights of Cydonia,” “Starlight,” and “Won’t Stand Down.”
articles.content: Just in time to jam out to Muses new album

articles.content:
Summer is ending, but Netflix movies never will. The streaming service has a slate chock full of movies for the rest of the year, including holiday rom-coms, spooky animation, and war dramas.

articles.title: Nintendo mobile RPG Dragalia Lost announces shutdown date
articles.description: Draglia Lost, the action RPG Nintendo launched in 2018, shuts down for good Nov. 30, 2022, the company announced on Tuesday.

Dragalia Lost, Nintendos original role-playing game for mobile devices, shuts down for good on Nov. 30, the games developers said Tuesday.

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Is the PS5’s global price increase coming to the U.S. market?
articles.description: With the PlayStation 5’s MSRP going up in all regions except for the U.S. it’s fair to wonder if that will end up biting consumers there, too, or if the economic conditions that cause the price jump will keep one at bay.
